name: Regenerate Game Jam - MyFarm
description:
Instructios:
Move WSDA or Arrow Keys
Collect vegetables and go to plant in the soil slots. Very simple for now but we want to improve the game with association plants, use water, hopefully show a sustainable way of growing the farm.

Game Design: @Mobley

Programmer: @carored

Art: @ldreaaml

Music: @LeinaB
